metadataAttributes.title: Pharmaceutical Preformulation and Formulation: A Practical Guide from Candidate Drug Selection to Commercial Dosage Form
metadataAttributes.keywords: Pharmaceutical development, preformulation, formulation, drug selection, biopharmaceutics, drug delivery, dosage forms, stability testing, regulatory requirements
metadataAttributes.description: A practical guide covering pharmaceutical preformulation and formulation, from candidate drug selection to commercial dosage form development.
metadataAttributes.categories: Pharmaceutical Sciences, Drug Development, Formulation, Biopharmaceutics
metadataAttributes.drug_development_stages: Candidate drug selection, preformulation, early drug development, formulation, scale-up, commercial production
metadataAttributes.dosage_forms_covered: Oral, parenteral, inhalation, ophthalmic, nasal, topical, transdermal
metadataAttributes.key_contributors: Mark Gibson,Gerry Steele,Anna-Lena Ungell,Bertil Abrahamsson,Joanne Broadhead,Peter Davies,Nigel Day,Keith R. Brain,Kenneth A. Walters,Paul Wrigh
metadataAttributes.main_topics: Drug discovery, candidate drug selection, preformulation studies, formulation development, biopharmaceutical considerations, regulatory environment, product optimization, stability testing, scale-up, commercialization
